item.description:
Boston has a rich cultural history, with world-renowned museums and historical sites, but few things are as quintessially Boston as watching a hockey game in an Irish Pub while drinking cold beer.  Ok, so maybe that's a stretch, but work with me here.  We're going to start the evening off with pub food and libations while watching the Bruins battle the Columbus Blue Jackets on one of The Burren's HDTVs.  Then it's time to get Footloose...

The eighties were recently voted one of the top three decades in the last thirty years.  Come celebrate the music of the adequate eighties at The Burren in Davis Square.  Scatter Shot will be playing your favorite tunes of the 80's on L80's Night with drink specials for the ladies, and $2.00 beers and $3.00 shots for the rest of us.  80's trivia and a singing contest with cash and prizes are the garnish to a great night out.

Come down for the game and stay as long as you want, or just show-up for the dancing and singing.
item.how_to_find_us: Tufts Meet-up Signs on our table(s).
item.name: Bruins-Bluejackets & 80's Music at the Burren
